title: BONUS: Fake Uber Driver Stabs Beloved College Student Over 120 Times When She Gets Into Wrong Car. VERDICT, GUILTY!
itunes:title: BONUS: Fake Uber Driver Stabs Beloved College Student Over 120 Times When She Gets Into Wrong Car. VERDICT, GUILTY!
description:
A South Carolina jury convicted Nathaniel Rowland of first-degree murder in connection with the death of 21-year-old University of South Carolina student, Samantha Josephson. Police say security footage showed Josephson getting into a black Chevrolet Impala that pulled up to the Bird Dog bar parking lot at around 2 a.m. Josephson was waiting on an Uber ride, according to police, and mistook the Impala driver as the Uber driver. Forensics expert Joe Scott Morgan, professor at Jacksonville State University, breaks down the evidence.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
